title: Interaction object
description: General information about an iteraction -- the ID of the taxa MUST be given, the ID of the population and states CAN be given

id.description: Access code for the interaction in the local database

taxa_from.description: ID of the taxa establishing the interaction

taxa_to.description: ID of the taxa receiving the interaction

pop_from.description: ID of the population establishing the interaction

pop_to.description: ID of the population receiving the interaction

item_from.description: ID of the population state or individual establishing the interaction

item_to.description: ID of the population state or individual receiving the interaction

strength_f.description: Strength of the interaction for the FROM population

units_f.description: Units in which the strength was measured

strength_t.description: Strength of the interaction for the TO population

units_t.description: Units in which the strength was measured

description.description: Some additional informations about the population
